description:
Municipalities' share of turnover tax

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
71231 Comparison of non-personal taxes

Definition:
Since 1998, the municipalities have been entitled to 2.2% of
the turnover tax revenue from which compensatory payments to
the Federation have been deducted. Since 1 January 2009, the
distribution of the municipalities' share of turnover tax to
the individual municipalities has been based on a standard
key for Germany that can be updated (Act on the Reform of
Municipality Finance as published on 10 March 2009 (Federal
Law Gazette I, p. 502)).
